languages.text: "Есть лишь один чистый путь узнать грядущее — это знаки, что Неумирающий шлет через Таро. Все прочее — ложь Архиврага".

traits.locale_text: "Если лишь один чистый путь узнать грядущее — это знаки, что Неумирающий шлет через Таро. Все прочее — ложь Архиврага".

languages.text: "There is only one pure way to know what is to come, and that is the signs that the Undying One sends through the Tarot. All else is the lies of the Archenemy."
languages.original_text: "Есть лишь один чистый путь узнать грядущее — это знаки, что Неумирающий шлет через Таро. Все прочее — ложь Архиврага".

traits.locale_text: "If there is only one pure way to know what is to come, it is the signs that the Undying One sends through the Tarot. All else is the lies of the Archenemy."
"If there is only one pure way to know what is to come, it is the signs that the Undying One sends through the Tarot. All else is the lies of the Archenemy."
"If there is only one pure way to know what is to come, it is the signs that the Undying One sends through the Tarot. All else is the lies of the Archenemy."
"There is only one pure way to know what is to come, and that is the signs that the Undying One sends through the Tarot. All else is the lies of the Archenemy."
"There is only one pure way to know what is to come, and that is the signs that the Undying One sends through the Tarot. All else is the lies of the Archenemy."
"There is only one pure way to know what is to come, and that is the signs that the Undying One sends through the Tarot. All else is the lies of the Archenemy."

languages.text: «Solo hay una forma pura de conocer el porvenir, y es a través de las señales que el Inmortal envía a través de Su tarot. Todo lo demás son embustes del Archienemigo».
languages.original_text: "There is only one pure way to know what is to come, and that is the signs that the Undying One sends through the Tarot. All else is the lies of the Archenemy."

languages.text: 「これから起こることを知るための純粋な方法はただ一つ。不死の者がタロットを通じて送ってくださる兆しです。それ以外はすべて、渾沌の勢力による嘘です」
languages.original_text: "There is only one pure way to know what is to come, and that is the signs that the Undying One sends through the Tarot. All else is the lies of the Archenemy."

languages.text: “若要预言未来，只有一种真正可行的方法，那就是通过不死之神的圣牌理解祂的预言。其他一切手段，都不过是混沌大敌的谎言。”
languages.original_text: "There is only one pure way to know what is to come, and that is the signs that the Undying One sends through the Tarot. All else is the lies of the Archenemy."

languages.text: "Es gibt nur einen reinen Weg, zu wissen, was kommt, und das sind die Zeichen, die uns der Todlose über das Tarot schickt. Alles andere sind Lügen des Erzfeindes."
languages.original_text: "There is only one pure way to know what is to come, and that is the signs that the Undying One sends through the Tarot. All else is the lies of the Archenemy."

languages.text: « Il n'y a qu'un seul moyen légitime de savoir ce que l'avenir nous réserve : les signes envoyés par l'Immortel via le Tarot. Tout le reste n'est que mensonges du Grand Ennemi. »
languages.original_text: "There is only one pure way to know what is to come, and that is the signs that the Undying One sends through the Tarot. All else is the lies of the Archenemy."
"There is only one pure way to know what is to come, and that is the signs that the Undying One sends through the Tarot. All else is the lies of the Archenemy."

languages.text: "Yaşanacakları bilmenin tek bir saf yolu vardır ve o da Ölmeyen'in Tarot üzerinden gönderdiği işaretlerdir. Geri kalan her şey, Şerbaşı'nın yalanlarından ibarettir."
languages.original_text: "There is only one pure way to know what is to come, and that is the signs that the Undying One sends through the Tarot. All else is the lies of the Archenemy."
